question3-1

package pack1;
public class Question3_1 {
 protected void display()
 {
  System.out.println("hello guys");
 }
}

question3-2

package pack2;
import pack1.Question3_1;
public class Question3_2 extends Question3_1 {
 public static void main(String[] args) {
  // TODO Auto-generated method stub
  Question3_2 ob=new Question3_2();
  ob.display();
 }
}
